description: This Dart source file defines a LocalStorageService class that manages persistent storage of simple data types such as lists, maps, and sets using SharedPreferences. It supports loading and saving user favorites, cart items, orders, and user profile data, primarily for offline or demo purposes.

classes.name: LocalStorageService
classes.description: A service class that provides methods to asynchronously load and save user-related data such as favorites, cart items, orders, and profile information using SharedPreferences.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Factory method to initialize the service and obtain a SharedPreferences instance asynchronously.

methods.name: loadFavoriteRestaurantIds
methods.description: Loads the set of favorite restaurant IDs stored in shared preferences.

methods.name: saveFavoriteRestaurantIds
methods.description: Saves a set of restaurant IDs as favorites into shared preferences.

methods.name: loadCartItems
methods.description: Loads cart items stored as a list of JSON maps from shared preferences.

methods.name: saveCartItems
methods.description: Saves a list of cart items as JSON into shared preferences.

methods.name: loadOrders
methods.description: Loads order data as a list of JSON maps from shared preferences.

methods.name: saveOrders
methods.description: Saves a list of orders as JSON into shared preferences.

methods.name: loadProfile
methods.description: Loads a user profile as a JSON map from shared preferences, if available.

methods.name: saveProfile
methods.description: Persists a user profile JSON map into shared preferences.
